alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun and central Victoria Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1029 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wood Hi, or 14 miles northwest of Port Lavaca, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Port Lavaca, Guadalupe, Point Comfort, Fordtran, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Dacosta, Wood Hi, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Placedo, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Victoria Regional Airport, Telferner and Ball Airport Area. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 638. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 576. US Highway 87 between mile markers 796 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
